short_summary: Supply and delivery of 1x Borescope for preventive and corrective maintenance of CC130H Hercules Aircraft
description: 435 Sqn has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) Borescope to carry out both preventive and corrective maintenance on the CC130H Hercules Aircraft.}
full_summary:
Tender Announcement for Borescope Supply
==============================

### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of one (1) Borescope for use by 435 Squadron in carrying out preventive and corrective maintenance on the CC130H Hercules Aircraft.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS4392708694
*   **Public Acquisition Notice Number:** W0133-24T038
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Submission Deadline:** June 10th, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Public Acquisition Notice Date:** May 8th, 2024
*   **Amendment Date:** May 28th, 2024

### Product/Service Requirements

The successful bidder must provide one (1) Borescope designed for carrying out preventive and corrective maintenance on the CC130H Hercules Aircraft.

### In-Scope Requirements

*   [Viewing and observing instruments and accessories] (in according to SDS UNSPSC Code 041117100)
*   Supply and delivery to 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Notice Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP), and the contracting authority uses an Open Bidding (Concurrentielle) method of [procurement].

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on Lowest Price.

### Contracting Authority

The contract will be administered by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) with the end-user being the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Solicitation Contact Information

-   **Name:** Shaylan Stein (SPAC/PSPC) - [shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) - (il-lui / he-him)

### Solicitation Notice

The full public acquisition notice, including detailed information about the solicitation, is available on the Ariba Discovery Platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19637488?extsite=MTk2Mzc0ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19637488?extsite=MTk2Mzc0ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg
